reviews.text: funny because were all excited to stay in this hotel but only to discover that this hotel had poor lighting, the shower was not good, the hot was not functioning anymore, the seat cover of the bowl in the CR was detached, were not sure if the beddings were freshly placed because my companion felt itchiness, she was so sensitive to dust, lastly the aircon was not that cold anymore, you have to wait for hours to feel coolness in your room, but all in all, its okay, were safe.
reviews.title: funny

reviews.text: stayed in a de luxe room for about $20 back in 2007. it was bare for the most part and unpretentious, but it suited us fine. the hotel is near the nightlife hub in cebu and we enjoyed hopping from one place to the next and then back to the hotel for comfort food and sleep.
reviews.title: cheap and friendly hotel in cebu, not the best, but would do
Not Reccomended
reviews.text: I booked this Hotel with Asia Rooms. On arrival was shown to a room with no refrigerator, I had thought that I had one when I booked. They said I could move to a room with a fridge for an extra cost, which I did. The room was crap, everything was falling apart. Could not get to sleep because of the noise from a Disco next door. Went to breakfast and was told that I would have to pay as I had booked through Asia Rooms even though the price I paid for the upgraded hovel with a fridge was the rack rate with breakfast. I checked out and moved to The Vacation Inn. Do not stay here!
If you like to rough it on a scale of camping and want cheap then stay here.
reviews.title: If You Like It Rough

reviews.text: Lots of bugs in the rooms, little unknown guys, misquitos and cockroaches dwell here.
reviews.title: Even a budget hotel should be better than this

reviews.text: I had a delux room for 1 night. The bed sheets were ancient with many holes. The bed was substandard, the room was delipated with crusty stuff on the shower and sink.
reviews.title: Ok Hotel

reviews.text: The TV did not work. Rundown airconditioning and non at all in the lobby.
reviews.title: Perfect voor fun and safety
